title: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not work until one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) is clicked on. This makes it difficult for users to navigate using the keyboard.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: We should be starting the Help view in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Try navigating using the tab key.
3. Notice that the tab key does not work until one of the 'live' areas is clicked on.
